message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you at a special price of $15,000. I think it will be very valuable for you, even more so than the listed price. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,000 is significantly below its true value. I could consider letting it go for $13,500. This is my final offer.
I'm still interested in the product, but I really need to stay within my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $11,000. Can you consider this price?
